sentences.english: The second chapter represents the basic fiduciary duties of the plan trustees.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是美国员工持股计划受托人的基本信义义务。

sentences.english: Macaulay represents Charles II as a faithless fanatic.
sentences.chinese: 麦考莱把查理二世描写为无信义的狂热者。

sentences.english: The former name of the school was Ma On Shan Lutheran Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 该校的前称为马鞍山信义学校。

sentences.english: Once again he has broken his faith with them.
sentences.chinese: 他又一次对他们不守信义。

sentences.english: The third chapter focuses the fiduciary duties of plan trustee in face of tender offer.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是面临要约收购时计划受托人的信义义务。

sentences.english: Please register at the Tourism Bureau stand which located near the main entrance of TWTC Exhibition Hall.
sentences.chinese: 请至本馆信义路入口处之观光局服务台登记。

sentences.english: Lutheran Church and friends of all circles to create a brilliant tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 信义愿与各界朋友共创辉煌的明天。

sentences.english: An abandoned coal mine in sub-urban of Taipei which is covered with a cabin.
sentences.chinese: 台北市信义区拇指山麓的废矿坑口，已被加盖铁皮屋。

sentences.english: I heard that Hsinyi District is very famous in Taipei.
sentences.chinese: 听说台北市的信义区很有名。

sentences.english: I tested the Jei in Hsin-Yi district of Taipei City yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 在台北信义区街头测试杰的手感。

sentences.english: Acting in good faith is a chinese tradition.
sentences.chinese: 讲信义是我们民族的传统。
